text.私の気持ちを、チョコに詰めました！\\n悲しい時も、悔しい時も元気にしてくれた\:
<size=27>I've made my feelings into chocolate! 
I want to cheer you up whenever you feel 
sad or frustrated, so I thought of carrots! 
You're the reason I've made it this far and why I'm still running. 
That's why I hope my emotions are clear! From Spe 
</size>
text.故郷の雪は静かで、まっさらで、\\nどこまでも白く続いていました。\\n私の大切:
<size=27>The snow in my hometown was quiet and pure, 
and it was white as far as eyes could see. 
It's truly one of my most precious and nostalgic sceneries. 
I wanted to be able to express how I feel about it… to you. 
I want to keep running alongside you to the end of this landscape. 
</size>
text.いつも頑張ってるトレーナーにプレゼント！\\nボクからの贈り物、光栄に思いたまえ:
<size=27>Here's a present for my always hard-working trainer! 
I hope you're honoured about my gift～♪ 
Since I made it myself, definitely take your time and savour it! 
Then tell me what you think of the taste too! 
Promise, okay? Looking forward to it! 
</size>
text.もとからブイブイ飛ばすのに夢中だったけど、\\n先頭でゴールしたい気持ちは前より:
<size=27>You know, I always liked steppin' on it but lately 
I've wanted to come home in first even more than 
before. You're there waiting for me at the finish 
line after all. And I will keep rushing to your side♪ 
</size>
text.『私にはリズムが、音楽が、大切な人がいる。\\nこれ以上何が必要だというんだい？:
<size=27>"I have rhythm, music and a person that is precious to me. 
Do I need anything else in life?" 

Today's a special day, so let's take our time 
to savour that thought one bite at a time. 
</size>
text.たくさん食べると、温かい気分になれる。\\nキミにもそんな気持ちを味わってほしく:
<size=27>Whenever I eat a ton, I get a warm and fuzzy feeling. 
I wanted you to experience that sorta emotion too, 
so I made it as big and generous as possible. 
I'd be happy if this filled you up. 
PS. Tell me if you can't eat any more. 
</size>
text.トレーナーへ\\n本物そっくりに作ってみたんだ！\\nカッコいいだろ？ いつか一:
<size=27>To Trainer: 
I tried to make 'em like the real things! 
Aren't they so cool? We should go touring one day! 
And go suuuper far! 
(Tandem sounds like a good idea) 
</size>
text.アンタだけのティアラよ。\\n\\n 大切にしなさい。: <size=27>It's your very own tiara. \nYou better take good care of it. \n</size>
text.Dear Trainer,\\nI filled this candy burg:
<size=27>Dear Trainer, 
I filled this candy burger with lots of love, just for you! 
Enjoy! 

Here's my feelings! 
</size>
text.移りゆく時の流れは早く、山野を流れる\\n川のように過ぎていきます。せわしない\:
<size=27>Like a river winding through hills and fields, the flow 
of time rushes by swiftly. I have prepared you a few 
traditional sweets with the hope to soothe your 
journey through these turbulent days, if only a little. 
May you find a moment of peace on your way. 
</size>
text.いつもお疲れさん。栄養のあるものとか\\n睡眠とかはしっかり取ってるかい？ なん:
<size=27>Thanks for your hard work as always. 
Are ya gettin' enough nutrition and sleep? My bad, that sounds 
like I'm naggin' ya, Tore-ko. 
But that's what it means to worry about yer companions. 
I'll continue lookin' after ya the same way you do for me! 
</size>
text.メジロの名にふさわしくありたいと\\n願うように、いつしか貴方の隣にも\\nふさ:
<size=27>Just as I wish to be worthy of the Mejiro name, 
I wish to be worthy of being close to you. 
Here is all my respect and gratitude to the one who 
always watches over and supports me. 
</size>
text.アタシとトレーナーさんのタッグは世界最強！\\nこれからもホットに、エネルギッシ:
<size=27>Me and my trainer's tag team is the strongest team in the world! 
Let's continue to spread our wings into the world 
by keeping it hot and energetic! 
FYI, there's a lot of Diablo in this, so careful 
when eating this with hot tea. 
</size>
text.ボクの手により、ボクをかたどって作られた\\nチョコレートさ。まばゆい輝き、しな:
<size=27>With my very own hands, I have made chocolate 
in the shape of my very self. A dazzling brilliance, 
a supple form, a sparkling "T.M. Opera O"!! 
It's all yours! Savour her to the fullest! 
—— Your High King 
</size>
text.礼だ ブライアン\\n\\n簡素なあいさつとなりすまない。\\nだが彼女なりの感:
<size=27>From me for you.    Brian 

Apologies for the simplicity of the greeting. 
But I am sure that she has expressed her full gratitude for you. 
Please keep taking care of my little sister.    Biwa Hayahide 
</size>
text.拝啓 君と出会い、共に歩むことにより、\\n視座高く万事に励めるようになったと感:
<size=27>Dear Trainer, 
I feel that by meeting and walking with you, I have been able to work 
hard in all things from a higher perspective. This is all thanks to your 
support. Even though we are in a relationship of mutual respect, 
I think I should express my gratitude in a tangible way. 
Thank you for everything.    Sincerely yours, Rudolf 
</size>
text.花が開くには、充分な栄養が必要だ。\\n我々にも同じことが言えるだろう。\\n時:
<size=27>Flowers require sufficient nutrients to grow. 
One could say the same holds true for us. 
Finding the time to relax occasionally is important. 
The flowers on the chocolates are a show of my appreciation. 
It may not be much, but I hope this gift can lift your spirits a little.</size>
text.あたしとトレーナーさんをつなぐもの、\\nそれはもちろんウマ娘ちゃんへの愛！！！:
<size=27>Of course you and I connect in our love for 
our precious horse girls!!! All are welcome☆ 
Moe is about talking and colliding with each other!!! 
Each crumb is filled with love and my interpretation of it. 
PLEASE MATCH THEM UP WITH EACH OTHER!! 
</size>
text.トレーナーさんは今ドームを割って、\\nひときれ食べました。はい、もぐもぐ～。\:
<size=27>Trainer just cut the dome open and started eating a slice. 
Munch, munch～ And then you find… that in your mouth…? 
※ Choking hazard! 
Haha, you who just thought, "She did something pretty cute!", 
I'll be waiting for you to repay me double～♪</size>
text.どや！ たこ焼きかと思って驚いたやろ？\\nなんでも、こーいうオモロさがないとあ:
<size=27>How's this?! Didya get surprised, thinking it was takoyaki? 
Everything's gotta have this kinda wow factor. 
You betcha it's the same with races! I'll win by a landslide 
and give everyone a shock as big as these sweets do! 
(I'll take three times whatcha owe me in return～♪) 
</size>
text.Dear My Trainer,\\nいつも私を支えてくれるキミへ、何か\\nお:
<size=27>Dear Trainer, 
I've worked hard at making you a dessert, as I wished to thank you 
for always supporting me. Being that my friends taste-tested 
them for me, I can guarantee they taste delectable ♪ 
Best wishes!    Fine 
</size>
text.日頃の感謝を込め、ケーキを贈ろう。\\n栄養面を考慮し、バナナを多く使用した。\:
<size=27>I'm giving you a cake as gratitude for the days we've spent together. 
A high proportion of bananas were used for their nutritional properties. 
Let us wish for each other's healthy and fulfilling life. 
Here is the nutritional value of this product: 
Protein: 24％ Fat: 35％ Carbs: 41％ 
</size>
text.★Dear my trainer★\\nトレーナーちゃんへの気持ちをこめて、\\:
<size=27>★Dear my trainer★ 
I made a slightly bitter cake with all my feelings for you in it! 
Isn't it so mature? Tell me how it tastes, okay?♪ 
I'm waiting for your heart-thumping comments! 
</size>
text.宵闇に月光が差し、\\n世界に彩りが生まれました。\\n月明かりは今日も優しく、:
<size=27>The moonlight shined through the darkness, and 
the world was filled with color. The moonlight is 
gentle and brilliant again tonight… I see, I can 
follow the path lit by the crescent moon, 
and I can continue to run. 
</size>
text.製造者：ミホノブルボン\\n保存方法：直射日光、高温多湿は避け、\\n涼しい場所:
<size=27>Manufacturer: Mihono Bourbon 
Storage: Keep away from direct sunlight, 
high temperatures and humidity 
※ Requesting your comments for reference when 
making chocolates in the future. 
</size>
text.ナッツたっぷりタンパク質も効果的に採れる\\n筋力アップチョコレートを作ってみま:
<size=27>Nut-filled snacks are also an essential source 
of protein, so I made these bulk-up chocolates. 
I absolutely recommend these after lifting weights! 
P.S. I have also included some thoughts about you. 
</size>
text.うまく走れた時も、おいしくお料理が\\nできた時も、1番に浮かんでくるのは\\n:
<size=27>Whenever I run really well or cook a delicious dish, 
the first thing that always comes to mind is your happy face♪ 
I wanna share my happiness and joy together with you, 
so I'll continue to give you lotsa Bono results♪ 
</size>
text.きりせんしょは、米粉を使った岩手のおやつ。\\nもちもちの食感に、ゴマとくるみの:
<size=27>Kirisensho is an Iwate snack that uses rice flour. 
The sticky texture, the sesame and walnut flavours all add 
to its deliciousness! This time, I dipped them in chocolate 
and tried to arrange them nicely for a "City Girl" feel! 
I hope you enjoy this rustic taste from home♪ 
</size>
text.お兄さまへ\\n最近ほんの少し、私でも誰かを喜ばせられる\\nことがあるかもって:
<size=27>To my big brother, 
Recently, I started to think that I might be able 
to do something to make someone happy. 
Today, I want to treat you, big brother. 
I will do my best with all I can do at the moment. 
</size>
text.妹たちも大好きなカップケーキだよ。\\n小麦粉の代わりにおからを使ってるの。\\:
<size=27>My little sisters love these cupcakes too. 
They're made with okara instead of wheat flour. 
Don't you eat too many sweets now! 

P.S. I swapped some sugar for lots of love♪</size>
text.やぁ、私のモルモット君。\\n日々の感謝を込めた贈り物はもう試したかい？\\n気:
<size=27>Good to see you, my dear guinea pig. 
This gift is packed with my appreciation towards you 
and our day to day activities, have you tried it yet? 
I would be happy if you enjoyed it. It's a unique 
mixture I made just for you, and no one else. Do let 
me know what you thought of the taste, in person. 
</size>
text.カカオは風邪予防にいいそうです\\n体調にはお気をつけて 以上: <size=27>Heard that cacao's good for preventing colds. \nTake care of your health.         That's it. \n</size>
text.―― Jeder Topf findet ――\\n seinen Deck:
<size=27>—— Jeder Topf findet seinen Deckel —— 
It's mysterious, really. When I think about 
this creation's recipient, I get even more impassioned. 
I hope you receive both the sweetness and the passion 
that went into this. 
</size>
text.お兄ちゃん\\nきゅんとくるあまずっぱさに\\n夢中になっちゃえ♪\\nあなたの:
<size=27>Big bro, 
Be charmed by the heart-pounding 
sweetness and bitterness♪ 

From your Cute Raspberry 
</size>
text.とっても楽しいおやつタイムにしましょうね♪\\nお腹いっぱい食べられるように紅茶:
<size=27>Let's have an amusing snack time today♪ 
I've prepared a lot of tea and sandwiches to fill you up! 
Please allow me to present a special moment for you. 
</size>
text.ハイカカオで甘さはないかもだけど、\\n体にいいものしか使ってないから。\\nエ:
<size=27>There's a lot of cacao in it so it's not as sweet, 
but I'd say that it's pretty good for your body. 
Counting on you tomorrow after you recharge your energy. 
</size>
text.バレンタインと言えば2月！ 2月といえば\\nほとんど春！ なのでサクラを贈りま:
<size=27>Valentine's Day is in February! February is 
practically Spring! As such, let us give the gift 
of Sakura! The fact we're spending our Bakushin 
days together is the result of the two of us looking 
to the future, and to the future of that, and then 
even further ahead to the future of that! Let's 
keep being exemplary together in this future, too! 
</size>
text.貝殻を開けて光を浴びることで、\\n真珠は初めて輝くの。\\n私たちで常識という:
<size=27>Pearls start to shine the moment you open 
the shell and let the light shower it. 
Let's break through the shells of common sense 
and light up the world. 
Always, and forever —— 
</size>
text.この牙が似合う子分になるんだぞ\\n\\nウインディ様より:
<size=27>You've become a henchman worthy of these fangs. 

From The Great Windy 
</size>
text.グランマ直伝の、魔法のチョコクッキーよ！\\n昔グランパはこれを食べて、グランマ:
<size=27>These are magical chocolate cookies straight from Grandma's oven! 
Grandma said that when Grandpa ate these a long time ago, 
he immediately couldn't separate himself from Grandma. 
Which means, the more you eat these, the more you'll be 
at my mercy as my magical familiar! Prepare yourself♪ 
</size>
text.トレーナーさんがお菓子を『3つ欲しい』って\\n――私に三冠をねだってくれた時、:
<size=27>You said you wanted "three sweets" —— 
I was just as happy as when you asked me for the Triple Crown. 
I hope that you become more open to voicing your wants. 
I'll make sure to give you anything you ask for♪ 
</size>
text.☆トレーナーさんへ☆\\nだれよりもイチバン支えてくれてありがとね！\\nいつま:
<size=27>☆To my trainer☆ 
Thank you for supporting me more than anyone else! 
I will show you a lot of fantastic performances so that 
you'll continue to like me as an idol forever, so you better 
watch out for them♪ From Falco☆ 
</size>
text.燃える色の果実は 貴方の情熱 \\n甘く柔らかな衣は 貴方の慈愛 \\n英雄の名:
<size=27>The burning colour of these fruits reflect your passion 
The sweet softness reflects your compassion 
The fragrance of fine wine that carries the hero's name 
is proof of my devotion to you 

I wish to continue walking with you along this path. 
</size>
text.ゼロだとかわいそーだしやる。\\n味わって食えし！: <size=27>Kinda felt bad if you got zero chocolates so I made this for ya. \nEat it up! \n</size>
text.・料理 3分（レンジ弱）\\n・付け合わせ 50秒（レンジ強）: <size=27>- Dinner      3 minutes (microwave heat low) \n- Side dish  50 seconds (microwave heat high) \n</size>
text.トレーナーさんにありがとうの気持ちをこめて\\nひとつひとつ大切に積みあげました:
<size=27>Each of these was carefully stacked with 
my gratitude towards you, Trainer. I did my best 
during training because you believe in me. 
… Everything is a precious memory to me. 
Let's stay together until I bloom into a big flower one day♪ 
</size>
text.トレーナーへ\\nいつもおうえんしてくれてありがとう！\\nいつもいっしょにがん:
<size=27>To Trainer 
Thank you for always cheering me on! 
Thank you for always working hard with me! 
I'm counting on you from here on out! 
I looooooooooooooove you! 
</size>
text.トレーナーさんに、心友の証を作ったっス！\\n相棒だけに渡す特別なヤツっスよ。ア:
<size=27>For you, Trainer. A token of our friendship! 
This is a special one just for my buddy. 
We're one-of-a-kind race partners, you and I! 
Let's dream the same dream and keep running together!! 
</size>
text.アタシの好きをいっっっぱいギュッとしたぞ！\\n ビコーペガ:
<size=27>I put aaaaaaaaall my love into this! 
From Biko Pegasus! 
P.S. Let's play Carrot Man together soon! 
</size>
text.マーベラス。窓から差し込む朝日。\\n夜露に濡れたアサガオ。踏切の下がる音。\\:
<size=27>Marvelous. The morning light streaming from a window. 
Morning glories with dew on them. The lowering of the crossing gate. 
Old overpasses. Guardrails. Sparkling blackboards. 
My friends' laughter. Valentine. 2:22. 
Sea glass. Trainer. Trainer's smiling face! 
</size>
text.運勢：超超吉！ 健康：無病息災！\\nトレーナーさんに幸あらんことを願いながら\:
<size=27>Fortune: Super Super Luck! 
Health: In sound condition! 
Feast on these cookies I made to wish you happiness. 
And also, thank you so much for everything. 
Your horsegirl is really happy thanks to you! 
</size>
text.空っぽは気楽だけど、埋めたい時もあるよね。: <size=27>Emptiness is comfy but sometimes it needs to be filled. \n</size>
text.※これはイメージ用。入れ間違えないように。\\nまずは感謝の言葉を入れる。\\n:
<size=27>※This is an outline. Make sure you don't add it to the gift. 
First, write a word of thanks. 
Write about how you hope they'll feel happy about the gift. 
Write about how you want to be together forever. 
(Is this too bold? Maybe write something different.) 
</size>
text.お部屋でゆっくり召し上がってください。\\n弟と妹用のついでなのでお気になさらず: <size=27>Take your time eating them in your room. \nHope you don't mind, they were for my little brother and sister. \n</size>
text.お中元とか、お歳暮とか、\\nそういう感じのバレンタインですよー。\\n\\n（:
<size=27>A little mid-year gift, or maybe like end-year? 
I'm not quite sure what Valentine falls under… 
(Sorry they're not cute chocolates) 
</size>
text.ハッピーバレンタイン\\n日頃の努力を称え、こちらを贈ります。\\nただし、現状:
<size=27>Happy Valentine's Day 
I present you with this in recognition of your daily efforts. 
However, do not be satisfied by the status quo. 
In order to always be first class, we must put in a joint effort 
and keep striving hard for our goals. 
</size>
text.おマチちゃん特製スペシャルマフィンです！\\n本当はもっとすっごい特別なのを作ろ:
<size=27>A special muffin specially made by Machers! 
I actually wanted to make something even more 
amazingly special, but I thought too much about 
Trainer's preferences and it ended up looking ordinary… 
But I think I made it taste good! Have a bite! 
</size>
text.＼＼トレーナーへ ウェーイ☆／／\\nパーマーさんのプレゼント、アガるっしょ！\:
<size=27>＼＼Yay-sies to Trainer☆／／ 
Get hyped by Palmer-san's present to you! 
Before, I was kinda roughin' it until I blew out, so I'm 
really grateful for the push my back needed! 
Anyways-ies, let's continue runnin' with all our might☆★ 
</size>
text.あ んまり怒らないとこ！\\nり おもいつかなかった！\\nが んばりや！\\n:
<size=27>Th         anks for not getting mad at me! 
A           I couldn't come up with anything for this one! 
N           onpareil! 
K           Keep being kind to Triple Turbo! 
YOU      'll like how good it is! Let's eat! 
</size>
text.トレーナーさん。あなたのおかげで、\\n私はいっそう輝きを増せました。その手際は:
<size=27>Trainer. Thanks to you, I have become even more radiant. 
That handiwork of yours reminded me of a first-class gemstone cutter. 
There was no other gift as perfect as this to give you. 
I shall keep paying forward this engraved brilliance of mine. 
</size>
text.未熟なあたしをいつも励まし、\\n支えてくれるトレーナーさん！\\nいつかのご恩:
<size=27>There's always been someone encouraging me in my experience, 
And I've gotten so much support from you, Trainer! 
I'm definitely going to repay you back one day for all you've done 
for me, but I wanted to express my gratitude more properly right now. 
I've put a lot of heart into this so eat up! 
</size>
text.以前、私を『わんちゃんに似ている』と\\n仰っていたので、こちらを作ってみました:
<size=27>You said that I looked like a little dog before, so I made this! 
"Dogs and cherry blossoms never forget their gratitude". 
I will never forget all the days that made me grow 
and dash forward for all my life. 
Let's continue to see the cherry blossoms in full woof! 
</size>
text.選択は一つ。\\nわかるな？: <size=27>There's only one answer. \nYou know what it is. \n</size>
text.春寒の候トレーナーさんにはご健勝のことと\\n拝察いたします。日頃の心強いご指導:
<size=27>I hope you are faring well in these cool days leading up to spring. 
For all the daily guidance and reassurance that you have given me, 
I would like to present you with a small token of my sincere gratitude. 
Perhaps it is due to my woeful experience, but I hope that this is 
something you have the opportunity to reminisce about in the future. 
</size>
text.トレーナー殿\\n平素からの感謝を込めて、\\n祖母に手習い、仕立てた一品です。:
<size=27>Esteemed Trainer, 
As a token of gratitude for your continued support of me, 
this is a product I have learned from my grandmother and modified 
for this purpose. Please eat every last bite. 
P.S. The small plate is a gift from my grandfather to you. 
</size>
text.トレーナーさまへ\\nこの手紙を読んでおられるならば、\\nケーキ作りが間に合っ:
<size=27>Dear Trainer, 
If you are currently reading this letter, I must have completed 
your cake right on time. I have baked all my feelings of gratitude 
for these days spent together into this dessert. I humbly request 
that you please take your time to taste and eat this cake. 
</size>
text.マカロナージュってとても難しいんですね！\\n何度も何度もやり直しになっちゃって:
<size=27>Macaronage is really hard! 
I had to retry again and again to get these right. 
But, I think they were pretty delicious in the end. 
I spent a lot of time making sure my feelings got across to you. 
Meilleurs vœux♪ 
</size>
text.トレーナーさんへ\\n いつもお世話になっております。\\n たくさんの感謝と思:
<size=27>To Trainer. 
You've always been there for me. 
I've put all my gratitude and memories into this. 
Let's make this year an amazing year. Together! 
— Narita Top Road 
</size>
text.如月には身を切る風が吹くと言われますが、\\nこうして筆をとる私の胸には、\\n:
<size=27>It's said that the winds in February are prone 
to cutting off abruptly, but I can feel a warm, 
triumphant breeze blowing through my heart as I write this. 
Let us continue going with the flow forever and ever. 
</size>
text.Dear Trainer\\n Happy Valentine's Day\\n:
<size=27>Dear Trainer, 
Happy Valentine's Day. 
Thank you as always. 

From Symboli Kris S 
</size>
text.Vīvāmus, mea Lesbia,\\natque amēmus.\\n時:
<size=27>Vīvāmus, mea Lesbia, atque amēmus. 
Don't you also get the urge to listen 
to the whispers of the God of Beauty? 
In the scent of roses, experiencing a bittersweet 
moment together doesn't sound like too bad of an idea. 
</size>
text.拝啓 梅花の候\\n平素は格別のご高配を賜り、\\n厚く御礼申し上げます。\\n:
<size=27>Greetings. During this season of the plum blossoms, 
I humbly bestow upon thee gratitude for thine continued camaraderie. 
I look forward to more guidance and encouragement in the hereafter. 

Sincerely yours, Daiichi Ruby 
</size>
text.（白紙だが、香水が吹きかけられているのか、\\n底のない甘さの中にスパイシーさを:
<size=27>(This letter's blank, but it smells good, 
like she sprayed perfume on it. 
It's spicy, with a bottomless sweetness…) 
</size>
text.色あせにくい、丈夫な紙を選んだのです。\\nだから、このメッセージカードも、\\: <size=27>I chose a strong, fade-resistant paper to write on. \nSo please keep this message card fore～ver. \n</size>
text.◇◆Happy Valentine's Day!◆◇\\n私が活躍できているのは:
<size=27>◇◆Happy Valentine's Day!◆◇ 
Thanks to your hard work, I'm able to be really active! 
But you need to take a break from time to time too. 
I hope my present helps in some way! 
</size>
text.色々、たくさん\\nありがとうございます\\n\\nシュヴァルグラン ＜･ ））:
<size=27>Put a lotta different things into it 
Thank you 

Cheval Grand ＜･ ））＞◁ 
</size>
text.ほんとの気持ちは、会ったときに伝えるね♡: <size=27>I'll tell you how I really feel next time I see you♡ \n</size>
text.あなたがいつもそうしてくれるのと同じく\\n体や、できれば心も、あたたまりますよ:
<size=27>May this warm your body, hopefully your heart too, 
as much as you always warm mine. 

Appreciate you        From K.S. Miracle 
</size>
text.☆最強開運チョコレート☆\\n・ナッツで仕事運を、チョコで金運をアップ！\\n・:
<size=27>☆The Strongest Good Luck Chocolates☆ 
- The nuts are for good luck at work, 
and the chocolate for more luck with money! 
- Fruits give an increased opportunity to meet 
and have great relationships with people! 
I hope this gives you more happiness in the future! 
Of course, I'll be there right beside you! 
</size>
text.ファンイベント用のクッキーの試作品です。\\nギリギリまで改良したいので、\\n:
<size=27>These are prototypes for a fan event. 
Since it's coming up soon, I would love 
some feedback on how they taste! 
I'm sure that with your help, they'll become 
better than ever! I'm counting on you! 
</size>
text.トレーナーさんへ\\nHappy Valentine's Day!\\n今年もと:
<size=27>To Trainer, 
Happy Valentine's Day! 
I made you a batch of very special treats this year. 
Cookies are meant to last for a while longer so I pray that 
I can continue running with you for many years to come, too. 
</size>
text.いつもありがとうございます！\\n全力で突っ走るヤツについてくるのは\\n大変だ:
<size=27>Thanks as always! 
It's kinda hard following people who give it their all. 
But I knew that I wanted to work hard with you together. 
That's why I hope you continue lookin' out for me! 
</size>
text.ハロー あなたへ\\n22分間隔の“FRB”\\n古いお手紙に『Wow!』と書く:
<size=27>Hello   To You, 
I'll write "Wow!" on your old letter 
like a 22 minute-interval "FRB". 
I hope my Hello reaches you. 
</size>
text.\\n ハッピーバレンタイン v（^_^）v\\n\\n 日頃の感謝を込め:
<size=27>Happy Valentine's Day v（^_^）v 

My daily gratitude is in these cookies. 
Please continue to look out for me. 
</size>
text.Hey, First Mate,\\nWhen it comes to expl:
<size=27>Hey, First Mate, 
When it comes to exploring, 
you can't forget the snacks. 
Take this and re-energize! 
P.S. Don't forget a map and a lantern! 
</size>
text.もとからブイブイ飛ばすのに夢中だったけど、\\n先頭でゴールしたい気持ちは前より:
<size=27>You know, I always liked steppin' on it but lately 
I've wanted to come home in first even more than 
before. You're there waiting for me at the finish 
line after all. And I will keep rushing to your side♪ 
</size>
text.お姉さまへ\\n最近ほんの少し、私でも誰かを喜ばせられる\\nことがあるかもって:
<size=27>To my big sister, 
Recently, I started to think that I might be able 
to do something to make someone happy. 
Today, I want to treat you, big sister. 
I will do my best with all I can do at the moment. 
</size>
text.お姉ちゃん\\nきゅんとくるあまずっぱさに\\n夢中になっちゃえ♪\\nあなたの:
<size=27>Big sis, 
Be charmed by the heart-pounding 
sweetness and bitterness♪ 

From your Cute Raspberry 
</size>
text.弟と妹の分と一緒に作ったので、\\n少し甘めです。コーヒーが合うと思います。\\:
<size=27>I made a batch for you with my little brother and sister, 
so they're a little sweet. They pair well with coffee. 
I drew the chocolate donut with the dog face 
because it reminded me of you. 
I hope you have a wonderful tea time with these. 
</size>
